measure_description: Manual measurement of single smart plug. Measured values
name: Shelly Plug S
config_flow_sub_profile_remarks:
You need to select a profile depending on your settings.
The ECO setting only changes the power consumption in the listed configurations. Activating any other settings not listed in the profile name will change the power draw.
"WLAN": No Access Point (AP), no ECO mode, only connected to network.
"WLAN + ECO": ECO setting turned on, repeater (AP) turned off.
author: SBD
